about_the_game:
The urban agriculture scenario is a paid DLC of Roots of Tomorrow. It takes place in the Ile-de-France region, and its goal is to show the diversity of urban agriculture.

You play as a person in charge of several spaces: collaborative vegetable gardens (on rooftops or not), basements, vertical farm, park.

New types of cultures and workshops are introduced in this scenario: market gardening, vertical culture, aromatics, salads, insertion vegetable garden...

You will have to deal with several issues, among others:
  • Adapting to the requirements and demands of the town hall.
  • Making enough money to continue your activity (through production, education and subsidies).
  • Develop with the acceptance of the population.
  • Facilitate access to each space.
  • Bring back biodiversity.
  • Adapt to climatic hazards.

Your goal: 10 years to "turn to green the city".

You play as a person in charge of several spaces: collaborative vegetable gardens (on rooftops or not), basements, vertical farm, park.

New types of cultures and workshops are introduced in this scenario: market gardening, vertical culture, aromatics, salads, insertion vegetable garden...

You will have to deal with several issues, among others:

  • Making enough money to continue your activity (through production, education and subsidies).
  • Develop with the acceptance of the population.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Roots of Tomorrow - Urban Agriculture

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th gen or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 260, Intel HD Graphics 6000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
